channel.title: Weapon attacjk style
channel.description: hey, i want to change a stab attack stylei know how to find the ids but not whee to add:P does anyone know that?

item.title: Weapon attacjk style
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Search public int GetWepAnim() in client.java you should see codes like theese: if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739) // D axe { return 1833; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377) // DB-Axe { return 1833; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1249) // D spear { return 412; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) // D hally { return 440; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434) // D mace { return 422; }
Make a new one under one code’s return 422; } the nuber in return doesn’t matter
The new one should be like this if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // Whip { return 1658; }
Explained if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == itemid) // item name or info { return emoteid; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2008, 01:37:17 AM[/size][hr]Here’s an emote id list: [code]<Weapons\Combat>

402 - Dragon Dagger stab emote
403 - Block with shield defensive emote
404 - Block no shield defensive emote
405 - Dragon spear special
406 - 2h crush style emote
407 - 2h slash style emote
408 - Scythe ‘REAP’ attack style
410 - Defensive block when 2h weapon equiped
412 - Stab
422 - PUNCH
423 - KICK
424 - Fore-arm block
439 - lol SPIN ATTACK
440 - Halberd “Slash” attack style
451 - Slash attack style (longsword, shortsword, ect.)
1060 - drag mace spec
1658 - Whip attack
1659 - Whip block
1660 - Whip walk
1661 - Whip run
1662 - Granite Maul stand
1663 - Granite Maul walk
1664 - Granite Maul run
1665 - Granite maul attack
1666 - Granite Maul block
1667 - Granite Maul special
1833 - drag baxe attack
2316 - standing holding toad shooter (fixed defice)
2318 - walking holding toad shooter
2323 - kick attack while wielding fixed device
2876 - DRAG AXE SPEC!!
2890 - DARKLIGHT SPEC!
2910 - spinning something and then throwing it
2927 - twirling weapon then hitting something
3157 - Dragon 2h special

2060 - veracs walk
2061 - veracs standing
2062 - veracs attack!!
2063 - veracs block
2064 - dharoks walk
2065 - dharoks standing
2066 - dharoks crush
2067 - dharoks slash
2068 - torags attack
2074 - karils holding bow
2075 - karils shooting
2076 - karils walking
2077 - karils running
2078 - ahrims attack non-magic
2079 - ahrims block
2080 - guthans ‘poke’?
2081 - guthans slash
2082 - guthans crush

0426 - Range (Bow)
0427 - Range (Cross-Bow)

[/code]

Read full topic
